name: SimpleGraph.lineGraph_adj_iff_exists
initialProofState:
V : Type u_1
G : SimpleGraph V
e₁ e₂ : ↑G.edgeSet
⊢ Iff (G.lineGraph.Adj e₁ e₂) (And (Ne e₁ e₂) (Exists fun v => And (Membership.mem (↑e₁) v) (Membership.mem (↑e₂) v)))
decl:
lemma lineGraph_adj_iff_exists {e₁ e₂ : G.edgeSet} :
    (G.lineGraph).Adj e₁ e₂ ↔ e₁ ≠ e₂ ∧ ∃ v, v ∈ (e₁ : Sym2 V) ∧ v ∈ (e₂ : Sym2 V) := by
  simp [Set.Nonempty, lineGraph]

name: SimpleGraph.lineGraph_bot
initialProofState:
V : Type u_1
⊢ Eq Bot.bot.lineGraph Bot.bot
decl: @[simp] lemma lineGraph_bot : (⊥ : SimpleGraph V).lineGraph = ⊥ := by aesop (add simp lineGraph)
